name: Polyhedral Gods
description:
As a dice fight other dice in an arena with dice that explode into more dice. Make sense?

- The HUD on the bottom right is your ammo (left-most one is next shot).

UPDATED CONTROLS

Left/Right Click: Shoot

Space: charge (rolls/damage of shots increase)

Shift: brace (slow down movement, more accuracy, but can't reload)
